message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1350000. This is my final offer for now.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $1200000?
